attributes.name: Blackened Blade
attributes.description: "A solid black blade fit for an outlaw."
attributes.parsed_description: "A solid black blade fit for an outlaw."

attributes.name: Black Fire
attributes.description: "The dark fire coven is a collective of some of Aeternum's most powerful pyromancers. To wield the black flame is to know true power."
attributes.parsed_description: "The dark fire coven is a collective of some of Aeternum's most powerful pyromancers. To wield the black flame is to know true power."

attributes.name: Blade of a Thousand Cuts
attributes.description: "No single strike shall kill you. Your death shall be the sum of the whole."
attributes.parsed_description: "No single strike shall kill you. Your death shall be the sum of the whole."

attributes.name: Blade of the Lost Duelist
attributes.description: "In life he was bold and few could challenge him. He carries this same hubris in undeath."
attributes.parsed_description: "In life he was bold and few could challenge him. He carries this same hubris in undeath."

attributes.name: Blazing Rapier
attributes.description: "When drawn from its sheathe, the rapier ignites."
attributes.parsed_description: "When drawn from its sheathe, the rapier ignites."

attributes.name: Blazing Reaver
attributes.description: "As hot as the sun and as light as a feather."
attributes.parsed_description: "As hot as the sun and as light as a feather."

attributes.name: Bleak Fire Staff
attributes.description: "There is no hope here."
attributes.parsed_description: "There is no hope here."

attributes.name: Blessed Wildwood Life Staff
attributes.description: "Take the blessing of the wilds upon you as you venture forth, and let this staff serve both as a protector and a guide."
attributes.parsed_description: "Take the blessing of the wilds upon you as you venture forth, and let this staff serve both as a protector and a guide."

attributes.name: Blessings of Balanos
attributes.description: "The great shaman Balanos guarded the sanctuary of Bronzegrove for eons, creating life and healing the wilds of Brightwood."
attributes.parsed_description: "The great shaman Balanos guarded the sanctuary of Bronzegrove for eons, creating life and healing the wilds of Brightwood."

attributes.name: Blightbane Warhammer
attributes.description: "The Angry Earth have a host of enemies, but blight is their most consistent struggle."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Angry Earth have a host of enemies, but blight is their most consistent struggle."

attributes.name: Blightbone Battleaxe
attributes.description: “A putrid stench lingers on the axe.”
attributes.parsed_description: “A putrid stench lingers on the axe.”

attributes.name: Blighted Recurve
attributes.description: "This bow stinks!"
attributes.parsed_description: "This bow stinks!"

attributes.name: Blightprick
attributes.description: "A single drop of blight is enough to kill anyone."
attributes.parsed_description: "A single drop of blight is enough to kill anyone."

attributes.name: Blight's Spike
attributes.description: "Blight is the Dryad's most hated enemy. Let this weapon guide you to their death."
attributes.parsed_description: "Blight is the Dryad's most hated enemy. Let this weapon guide you to their death."

attributes.name: Blind Justice
attributes.description: "With a blind fold over my eyes I shall let fate decide who lives and who dies."
attributes.parsed_description: "With a blind fold over my eyes I shall let fate decide who lives and who dies."

attributes.name: Blistering Heat
attributes.description: The handle gets a little too warm when you cast a lot of spells in a row with this staff.
attributes.parsed_description: The handle gets a little too warm when you cast a lot of spells in a row with this staff.

attributes.name: Blood and Flesh
attributes.description: "Look no further if you hunger for the sight of blood. With this in hand you shall feast your eyes."
attributes.parsed_description: "Look no further if you hunger for the sight of blood. With this in hand you shall feast your eyes."

attributes.name: Bloodbane Reaver
attributes.description: "I'll cut through you as I cut through meat."
attributes.parsed_description: "I'll cut through you as I cut through meat."

attributes.name: Bloodboiled Longbow
attributes.description: "A dark maroon coat of "paint" lingers on the treated wood limbs."
attributes.parsed_description: "A dark maroon coat of "paint" lingers on the treated wood limbs."

attributes.name: Blood Boiling Fire Staff
attributes.description: "A slow death is much worse than a quick death."
attributes.parsed_description: "A slow death is much worse than a quick death."

attributes.name: Blood Eagle Spear
attributes.description: "A cruel ceremony, the blood eagle is fit only for the lowest of the low."
attributes.parsed_description: "A cruel ceremony, the blood eagle is fit only for the lowest of the low."

attributes.name: Bloodfeast
attributes.description: "Drink the blood of your foes."
attributes.parsed_description: "Drink the blood of your foes."

attributes.name: Bloodfeud
attributes.description: "The hate between the two families went so far back that no one alive even remembered why they hated the others."
attributes.parsed_description: "The hate between the two families went so far back that no one alive even remembered why they hated the others."

attributes.name: Bloodforged Longsword
attributes.description: "This blade passes from battlefield to battlefield, finding a new wielder each time."
attributes.parsed_description: "This blade passes from battlefield to battlefield, finding a new wielder each time."

attributes.name: Bloodied Crusher
attributes.description: "The heat of battle is a grim place. Sometimes it's difficult to separate friend from foe."
attributes.parsed_description: "The heat of battle is a grim place. Sometimes it's difficult to separate friend from foe."

attributes.name: Bloodletter
attributes.description: "One swing from this and your humours will settle."
attributes.parsed_description: "One swing from this and your humours will settle."

attributes.name: Bloodline Heir
attributes.description: "An intricate set of engraved capillaries allow it to siphon blood over the surface of the blade."
attributes.parsed_description: "An intricate set of engraved capillaries allow it to siphon blood over the surface of the blade."

attributes.name: Bloodlust
attributes.description: "With every shot my heart beats faster. I hunger for the kill. What is this place doing to me?"
attributes.parsed_description: "With every shot my heart beats faster. I hunger for the kill. What is this place doing to me?"

attributes.name: Bloodpiercer
attributes.description: "Dull arrows won't kill you nearly as fast as a razor sharp arrow would. Rather, you'll lay in agony as the blood slowly departs your body."
attributes.parsed_description: "Dull arrows won't kill you nearly as fast as a razor sharp arrow would. Rather, you'll lay in agony as the blood slowly departs your body."

attributes.name: Bloodright
attributes.description: "I never wanted this, and yet I was born to rule. So rule I shall."
attributes.parsed_description: "I never wanted this, and yet I was born to rule. So rule I shall."

attributes.name: Bloodshot Reaver
attributes.description: "The town bells rang as the barbarians descended upon the village, ready to plunder and pillage."
attributes.parsed_description: "The town bells rang as the barbarians descended upon the village, ready to plunder and pillage."

attributes.name: Bloodspiller
attributes.description: "Drink in the blood of your enemies."
attributes.parsed_description: "Drink in the blood of your enemies."

attributes.name: Bloody Rudder
attributes.description: "Steer your ship or steer your vengeance."
attributes.parsed_description: "Steer your ship or steer your vengeance."

attributes.name: Blunderbuss of the Elder God
attributes.description: "Watch your tongue heretic, lest I remove your head alongside it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Watch your tongue heretic, lest I remove your head alongside it."

attributes.name: Blunderbuss of the Risen Dead
attributes.description: "Open their coffin and put them back in."
attributes.parsed_description: "Open their coffin and put them back in."

attributes.name: Bondsman's Fire Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Bondsman's Fire Staff of the Scholar
attributes.description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."

attributes.name: Bondsman's Flatbow
attributes.description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."

attributes.name: Bondsman's Great Axe
attributes.name_with_affixes: Bondsman's Great Axe of the Soldier
attributes.description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."

attributes.name: Bondsman's Hatchet
attributes.description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."

attributes.name: Bondsman's Kite Shield

attributes.description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are bound by oath to this land. If we tarry, we fall. So, we work."
